text:
wash away the anger,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be gloom

and it will come,
like a flood of rain,
pouring down on me

and it will never let up,
until the end is near
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat
